title: Somali to Mori no Kamisama (Somali and the Forest Spirit)
synopsis: In a world inhabited by demons, cyclopes, and other fantastic creatures, humans stand apart as the outcasts. Quick to anger, the human race engaged in a war that all but wiped them out. The few humans that remain are seen as a delicacy, serving no purpose but to be hunted down and eaten.
voices: ['Minase, Inori', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Nanami, Hiroki', 'Suzuki, Tatsuhisa', 'Hayami, Saori', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Seki, Tomokazu', 'Ono, Yuuki', 'Hayami, Show']
staff: [['Yamaoka, Akira', ['Producer']], ['Yasuda, Kenji', ['Director']], ['Hamano, Takatoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Minase, Inori', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics']]]
